item.title: Ssh Add Issue for Git Push
item.description: Struggled with pushing Vim-fugitive. The main issue was happening whenever I tried to push on Vim-fugitive. Problem load Username failed fatal: could not read Username for 'https://github.com': No such device or address ssh-askpass error ssh_askpass: exec(/usr/bin/ssh-askpass): No such file or directory debian Cause The message meant that I wasn’t verified with my own SSH. Solution had to install ssh-add, through sudo apt-get install ssh-add. firstly made sure whether do I have the keygen existed by ls -al ~/.
